players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today to win."
You: "I am not the mafioso. Charlie is lying to save himself or confuse us. Voting me out now lets the real mafioso win."
Bob: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice first instead of someone more suspicious? This seems risky."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice because I had to start somewhere. She is the mafioso. Trust me, or we lose tonight."
Bob: "I vote Alice. Charlie's claim as detective is our only lead, and we must act on it before nightfall."
You: "I am being framed by Charlie to cover his own tracks. Don't rush to vote me out without clear proof."

Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
